thing.title: Tweezers
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: At a 45 degree angle, the longest object you can print on the MakerBot is actually ten centimeters times the square root of two!These tweezers come in straight and angle kind, and although you'd have a hard time getting most electronics engineers to trade their metal ones in, you probably wouldn't see them turning down having a few more pair lying around for the cost of their weight in ABS!
